ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter on PvP Server
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you hit level 12 yet?  I m curious about the looting changes that have been made on the server. SCENARIO ONE: I use Charm on a player and have them commit
ygData.messageBody:
Have you hit level 12 yet? I'm curious about the looting changes that
have been made on the server.

SCENARIO ONE:
I use Charm on a player and have them commit suicide by fighting a
Griffin. Do I get to loot their body? The Griffin actually killed them,
but I was in control of them.

SCENARIO TWO:
I Charm player one and have him kill player two. Who gets to loot player
two?

From: Wizard LABBS [mailto:wizard-labbs@...]

Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter on PvP Server


From: "Wizard LABBS" <wizard-labbs@...>
